mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_ROLES (User_Role_Num, usernum, userid, role) VALUES (USER_ROLES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u3.* ,( SELECT LISTAGG(r2.ROLE, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY u2.ID) FROM USER_TBL u2 ,USER_ROLES r2 WHERE r2.USERID = u2.ID AND r2.USERID = u3.ID ) AS "ROLE" FROM USER_TBL u3 ,USER_ROLES r3 WHERE u3.ID = r3.USERID AND ${fld} = #{val}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT u.*, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1) / #{limit} + 1) PAGE FROM( SELECT * FROM USER_TBL) u ) WHERE PAGE = #{page}

USER_ROLES
USER_TBL

${searchKey} = #{searchWord}
